full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Forklift Batteries: Request for Proposal

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, PSPC, invites bidders to submit proposals for the purchase of forklift batteries, as outlined in the solicitation document.

**Solicitation Details**

* Solicitation Number: WS3534526608
* Reference Number: WS3534526608-Doc3591445348
* Publication Date: August 16, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 18, 2022, 1400 ADT
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 16, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: March 21, 2023

**Scope of Work**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires 18 forklift batteries that must be installed on DND’s equipment. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering the batteries and ensuring they are properly installed.

**Trade Agreement**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**

The forklift batteries are required to be delivered to the following regions:

* Canada
* Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or clarification on the solicitation document, please contact:

Tyler, Kirk (SPAC/PSPC)
kirk.tyler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**

The solicitation document can be found at the following link:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13765801
